dataList.dlg: Hiya~ I'm Rodya. I have a longer name, but that makes things look cold, so just stick with Rodya~
Yawn~ Up already? I'm gonna get some more sleep. I hope someone makes breakfast for me.
What'd you have for lunch? As for me, a juicy slab of meat...was what I wanted, but Faust said no.
Having trouble sleeping? How about a round of poker with me? We'll play heads-up. Fuhu.
People say you should shun money... but that's a load of crap. Sure, worshiping money is a highway to disaster, but when you're a lover of money like me, you're set for success.
You gotta take it easy with the work, Dante. Everyone needs breaks from time to time. ...So why don't you go outside and buy me some sweets. Hm?
My favorite things... Taking a bite of premium meat and playing card games. And I'll be the winner no matter what we play.
My hometown was freezing cold. This is a greenhouse compared to that. It sometimes feels a little too warm, though. What about yours, Dante? Oh, right... Tell me when you remember, 'kay?
You really are an odd one, Dante darling. How can you stand living such a boring life? Did you forget about all your favorite stuff when you lost your head? If so, that's... Yeah, that's kinda sad...
Dante? Are you out shopping? Can I count on you to get me some grub?
Need a hand?
Let's get this done quickly and get some grub~
What? Did you miss me?
I'll be back in a jiffy~
Is that all?
Ngh...!
Score! You owe me a treat, Dante~
Oh, gee... You've got some work cut out for you, Dante~
I bet the others woulda gone bust.
Bah~ I warned ya.
Piece of cake~ Y'know I'm looking forward to a stronger reward than compliments... Right?
Per~fection! Heck, I might even say that was below my level.
You coulda done better~ Just saying, it's not my fault.
